name: Baunsudaun
description:
What is Baunsudaun?

Baunsudaun is a game developed in 2020 for the original Game Boy that is based on an old Java game.  See how long you can survive in Baunsudaun and compete for your personal best score.  In Baunsudaun you control 'Blob' by moving him left or right.  There are 7 different types of platforms that will spawn all with different effects.  Your goal is to not hit the spikes on the ceiling, or land on the fire at the bottom by trying to use the platforms to keep Blob alive as long as possible.  While all this is going on, the lines will continually move faster making it more difficult the higher your score gets.

Platforms

Normal Platform

Cloud Platform

Left Platform

Right Platform

Bouncy Platform

Growth Platform

Shrink Platform

Technical Details

Baunsudaun is an original Game Boy game that runs on actual hardware or emulators built to emulate the Game Boy hardware.  In order to play the game (.gb file), you will need a Game Boy flashcart (Everdrive, EZ Flash, etc), or a Game Boy emulator of your choice.  Please note I haven't tested all flastcarts or emulators so some might have issues.  Optionally if you're more technically inclined you can flash the game to your own Game Boy cart.
